description: Creates a preview of the MIME content of an email when provided with a template and a set of replacement data. You can execute this operation no more than once per second.

parameters.name: TemplateData
parameters.description: A list of replacement values to apply to the template. This parameter is a JSON object, typically consisting of key-value pairs in which the keys correspond to replacement tags in the email template.

nested_items.name: RenderedTemplate
nested_items.description: The complete MIME message rendered by applying the data in the TemplateData parameter to the template specified in the TemplateName parameter.
